subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
legal_status: NON FOR PROFIT ASSOCIATION - organisation of liver diseases patients
goals__remit: ELPA’s vision is that all liver patients are diagnosed in time, are treated with respect, and have equal access to the best standard of medical care - regardless of origin, lifestyle, and type of liver disease. Our ultimate goal is a world without liver diseases.
